definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: Reflect in the night, put on the table a glass of warm milk.
sentences.chinese: 体现在夜间，摆放在桌前那一杯温热的牛奶。

sentences.english: I cupped the deers muzzle in my hand and breathed into its hot mouth.
sentences.chinese: 我用手环住鹿的吻部，往它温热的嘴里吹气。

sentences.english: Comparison of Indoor thermal Envionment by the Different Construction of Stone-slab Houses …
sentences.chinese: 不同类型石板屋工法对于室内温热环境之比较。

sentences.english: He recommends regular hot water rinses and massaging of the scalp with fingertips.
sentences.chinese: 他建议使用温热水漂洗，而且用手指点触按摩头皮。

sentences.english: Ha-Tu Gold Deposit is a postmagmatic mesothermal deposit.
sentences.chinese: 哈图金矿局岩浆期后中温热液矿床。

sentences.english: Use mild detergent to wash after use.
sentences.chinese: 使用后用温热的洗洁精清洗。

sentences.english: The hot grease of the pizza is nicely washed down by the refreshing beer.
sentences.chinese: 比萨的温热的油脂伴随着鲜酿的冰啤酒滚入腹中。

sentences.english: The infrared ray warms up the magnetic force treatment, ameliorative blood circulation, instauration physical strength.
sentences.chinese: 红外线温热磁力治疗，改善血液循环，恢复体力。

sentences.english: Ceramic artists always deal with forms and the three dimensions of space.
sentences.chinese: 温热生水三度空间彻底分离。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the safety of intraperitoneal hyperthermic chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腹腔温热灌注化疗的安全性和可行性。

sentences.english: Do not sterilize by steam sterilizer or boiled water.
sentences.chinese: 请使用温热水冲烫消毒，请勿蒸煮消毒。

sentences.english: If the illness needs, usable a few tepid yellow rice or millet wine are irruptive take.
sentences.chinese: 如病情需要，可用少量温热黄酒冲入服用。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the sensitivity of hyperthermia at different temperatures to taxotere and its mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨不同温热对多西紫杉醇增敏的规律及其机制。

sentences.english: A warm, soothing mug of herbal tea might, though.
sentences.chinese: 那么也许可以泡上一杯温热的花茶。

sentences.english: Heat oil in pan. On medium heat add potatoes a few slices at a time so they don't stick together.
sentences.chinese: 用炒锅中温热油，依次加入几片土豆翻炒，使不粘连。

sentences.english: The warm stones strewed their flakes upon the cobble .
sentences.chinese: 鹅卵石路上撒满温热的石头碎片。

definition: to warm oneself/to expel the cold (TCM)

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
